data.game_display_settings:
#### Graphics

- **WINDOWED MODE:** Fullscreen
- **RESOLUTION:** 1280x800
- **VSYNC:** On
- **MOTION BLUR:** 0
- **Resolution Quality:** 50
- **View Distance Quality:** High
- **Shadows Quality:** Medium
- **Textures Quality:** Ultra

data.additional_notes: Resolution Quality 75 also gives good results

reports_summary: The single report shows the community finds Scars Above on the Steam Deck OLED runs mostly at 60 FPS when played at the handheld’s native 1280×800 with V‑Sync on and an in‑game 60 FPS cap; textures can stay high while shadows and effects are lowered, and bumping resolution quality to 75 was said to still hit the target. That setup delivers steady, smooth play with reduced stutter, though no power or battery figures were provided so the runtime trade-off is unclear.
